bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Callaghan House was a hotel in Callaghan, West Virginia that burned in 1870.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This register records the guests who visited the Callaghan House from 1866-1869. The many prominent signatures in the register include Robert E. Lee (September 3, 1868).
